Uses of Package
xades4j.properties

  • Packages that use xades4j.properties 
    Package Description
    xades4j.production
    Support for signature production.
    xades4j.properties
    Types that represent the different XAdES qualifying properties.
    xades4j.properties.data
    Low-level representation of the qualifying properties information and corresponing structural verification.
    xades4j.providers
    Interfaces for the different components in signature production and verification.
    xades4j.utils
    Utility classes used in the library, which may also be usefull outside.
    xades4j.verification
    Support for signature verification.
  • Classes in xades4j.properties used by xades4j.production 
    Class and Description
    AllDataObjsCommitmentTypeProperty
    A commitment type that applies to all the signed data objects.
    DataObjectDesc
    Base class for descriptions of the signed data objects.
    OtherSignedDataObjectProperty
    Base class for custom signed data object properties.
    OtherUnsignedDataObjectProperty
    Base class for custom unsigned data object properties.
    QualifyingProperties 
    QualifyingProperty
    Base interface for all the qualifying properties.
    SignedSignatureProperty
    Base class for all the signed signature properties.
    UnsignedProperties 
    UnsignedSignatureProperty
    Base class for all the unsigned signature properties.
  • Classes in xades4j.properties used by xades4j.properties 
    Class and Description
    AllDataObjsCommitmentTypeProperty
    A commitment type that applies to all the signed data objects.
    CommitmentTypeProperty
    A commitment type that applies to some signed data objects.
    CommitmentTypePropertyBase
    Base class for the CommitmentTypeIndication property.
    DataObjectDesc
    Base class for descriptions of the signed data objects.
    DataObjectFormatProperty
    Represents the DataObjectFormat signed data object property.
    DataObjectProperty
    Base class for all the data object properties.
    DataObjectProperty.TargetMultiplicity
    Represents the number of data objects that a property can be applied to.
    IdentifierType
    The object IdentifierType as defined in XAdES.
    IndividualDataObjsTimeStampProperty
    Represents a time-stamp computed before the signature production, over a sequence formed by some of the ds:Reference elements within the ds:SignedInfo referencing whatever the signer wants to sign except the SignedProperties element.
    ObjectIdentifier
    An object identifier which may be an URI or an OID.
    OtherSignedDataObjectProperty
    Base class for custom signed data object properties.
    OtherUnsignedDataObjectProperty
    Base class for custom unsigned data object properties.
    QualifyingProperty
    Base interface for all the qualifying properties.
    SignaturePolicyBase
    Base class for the SignaturePolicyIdentifier property.
    SignatureProperty
    Base class for all the signature properties.
    SignedDataObjectProperty
    Base class for all the signed data object properties.
    SignedProperties 
    SignedSignatureProperty
    Base class for all the signed signature properties.
    SignerRoleProperty
    Represents the SingerRole signed signature property.
    UnsignedDataObjectProperty
    Base class for all the unsigned data object properties.
    UnsignedProperties 
    UnsignedSignatureProperty
    Base class for all the unsigned signature properties.
  • Classes in xades4j.properties used by xades4j.properties.data 
    Class and Description
    ObjectIdentifier
    An object identifier which may be an URI or an OID.
  • Classes in xades4j.properties used by xades4j.providers 
    Class and Description
    CounterSignatureProperty
    Represents the CounterSignature unsigned signature property.
    DataObjectDesc
    Base class for descriptions of the signed data objects.
    ObjectIdentifier
    An object identifier which may be an URI or an OID.
    OtherSignedSignatureProperty
    Base class for custom signed signature properties.
    OtherUnsignedSignatureProperty
    Base class for custom unsigned signature properties.
    SignaturePolicyBase
    Base class for the SignaturePolicyIdentifier property.
    SignatureProductionPlaceProperty
    The SignatureProductionPlace property indicates the purported place where the signer was at the time of signature creation.
    SignerRoleProperty
    Represents the SingerRole signed signature property.
    SigningTimeProperty
    The SigningTime property specifies the time at which the signer (purportedly) performed the signing process.
  • Classes in xades4j.properties used by xades4j.utils 
    Class and Description
    SignedSignatureProperty
    Base class for all the signed signature properties.
    UnsignedSignatureProperty
    Base class for all the unsigned signature properties.
  • Classes in xades4j.properties used by xades4j.verification 
    Class and Description
    DataObjectDesc
    Base class for descriptions of the signed data objects.
    ObjectIdentifier
    An object identifier which may be an URI or an OID.

    Base interface for all the qualifying properties.
